c:complexType.name: DockedPanel
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class of CCC docked panels.

c:property.name: position
c:property.c:documentation: The docking position of the panel.

c:property.name: align
c:property.c:documentation:
The alignment side of the panel (the source) that will align to a side of the parent panel (the target).
The alignment side must be orthogonal to the docking side.
The default value is 'middle', if is an horizontal side, and 'center', otherwise.

c:property.name: alignTo
c:property.c:documentation:
The alignment side or position of the parent panel (the target) that will align with the alignment side of this panel, the source.
The default value is the value of .
See for information on supported data types.

c:property.name: keepInBounds
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the layout should try that the panel be kept inside its parent, by changing its position.

c:property.name: margins
c:property.c:documentation:
The margins of the panel.
See for information about the different supported data types.

c:property.name: paddings
c:property.c:documentation:
The paddings of the panel.
See for information about the different supported data types.

c:property.name: font
c:property.c:documentation:
The font of the panel.
